text: Tara'i kebala mumina yara allah‌te o tamra rasule imana ane, ara yakhana tara kono samastigata byapare tamra sange thake takhana tara cale yaya na yataksana na tara tamra theke anumati niyeche. Nihsandeha yara tomara anumati prarthana kare tara'i hacche ora yara allah‌te o tamra rasule imana eneche, sutaram tara yakhana tadera kono byaparera jan'ya tomara anumati prarthana kare takhana anumati da'o tadera madhyera yake tumi iccha kara, ara tadera jan'ya allah‌ra ksama prarthana kara. Nihsandeha allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
